document.masterDocTitle: Revision of the genus Odocnemis Allard, 1876 (Coleoptera: Tenebrionidae: Helopini) from Turkey, the Caucasus and Iran with observations on feeding habits

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material (studied).
Odocnemis anatolica .
Lectotype (MNHP), ♀, designated here, with labels: “281” (print), “Un de Vauloger” (handwritten), “type” (handwritten), “
Helops ( Stenomax ) anatolicus Vaul.
n. sp. (Vauloger Vidiv.)” (handwritten), “Syntypus” (red, print), “Muséum Paris, 1958, Coll. M. Pic” (print). Paralectotype (MNHP), ♀, with labels: “281” (handwritten), “type” (handwritten), “Syntypus” (red, print), “Muséum Paris, 1958, Coll. M. Pic” (print).

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 1.
O. anatolica
, male. A) Left elytron. B) Apical part of left elytron. C) Coeloconic sensillum. D) Head. E) Protibia. F) Mesotibia.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Odocnemis korbi
. Holotype (♂) and 1 paratype (♀) (HNHM) with original labels: “Konia 1900 Korb, Coll. Reitter”, “
O. korbi
m. 1900 Konia” and curator’s labels: “Holotypus
Odocnemis korbi
♂, 1902, Reitter” and “Paratypus
Odocnemis korbi
♀, 1902, Reitter”.

Other studied material.
Turkey , “ Anatolien , Konya , 1899, leg. Korb ”, 2♂♂ , 1♀ ( HNHM )
;
Turkey , “ Anatolien , Ak-Shehir 1900, leg. Korb ”, 2♂♂ , 1♀ ( HNHM )
; “
Odocnemis korbi Anatol.
”, 1♂ (ZIN);
Turkey , Sertavul pass,
12–13.v.1983
, leg. S. Kar , H. and L. Freude , 1♀ (CL ex coll. H. Bremer )
;
Turkey , Konya Province , Yunuslar ,
17.iv.1990
, leg. Szekely , 2♂♂ , 7♀♀ (CS)
;
Turkey , Karaman , Sertavul gec.,
26.v.2001
, leg. M. Snižek , 1♀ (CT)
;
Turkey , Konya Province , Beyşehir District , Sağlık , 37°49′34.5″N 32°01′46.5″ E ,
1560 m
,
16.v.2010
,
on
Cedrus libani
, leg. M.V. and S.V. Nabozhenko , B. Keskin , 10♂♂ , 3♀♀ ( ZIN and CN), 4♂♂ , 6♀♀ (dry material) and 9♂♂ , 6♀♀ (in ethanol) ( ZDEU )
;
Turkey , Içel Province , Dümbelek Dağ , Ayranci road, 37°00′34.5″N 34°05′24.7″E ,
2092 m
, leg. B. Keskin , under stones, 1♂ ( ZIN ), 2♀♀ (dry material) and 1♂ (in ethanol) ( ZDEU )
;
Turkey , Karaman Province , Karadağ , 37°23′27.3″N 33°08′23.1″E , leg. B. Keskin , E.A. Yağmur and A. Uzum , 2♂♂ , 2♀♀ ( ZDEU )
;
Turkey , Niğde Province , Çiftlik District , Hasan Dağ ,
1900 m
, 38°07′07.5″N 34°15′27.2″E ,
14.iv.2014
, leg. M.V. and S.V. Nabozhenko , B. Keskin , 11♂♂ , 23♀♀ ( ZIN , CN), 11♂♂ , 22♀♀ dry and 6♂♂ , 11♀♀ in ethanol ( ZDEU )
;
Turkey , Karaman Province , Karadağ , 38°07′07.5″N 34°15′27.2″E ,
2200 m
,
18.04.2015
, leg. E.A. Yağmur , M.V. and S.V. Nabozhenko , B. Keskin , I. Chigray , 2♂♂ , 3♀♀ (CN), 2♂♂ ( ZDEU )
.

Bionomics. The species was found on
Cedrus libani
in the evening (about 22:00) in Sağlık. The beetles were observed to feed on lichens. Specimens from Dümbelek Dağ were collected under stones with lichens.
